quote: To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. – Gilbert Chesterton
fact: All of the clocks in the movie "Pulp Fiction" are stuck on 4:20, a national pot-smokers hour.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I saw an ad in a shop window, "Television for sale, $1, volume stuck on full", I thought, "I can't turn that down".
